name: A (First Raikage)
summary: A (エー, Ē, Viz: Ei, English TV: Ay) was the First Raikage (初代雷影, Shodai Raikage, Literally meaning: First or Founding Lightning Shadow) who founded Kumogakure in the Land of Lightning.

name: A (Fourth Raikage)
summary: A (エー, Ē, Viz: Ei, English TV: Ay) is the Fourth Raikage (四代目雷影, Yondaime Raikage, Literally meaning: Fourth Lightning Shadow) of Kumogakure.
novel: Kakashi Hiden: Lightning in the Icy Sky
game: Naruto Shippūden: Gekitō Ninja Taisen! Special
occupation:
Raikage
Supreme Leader of the Allied Shinobi Forces

name: Homura Mitokado
summary: Homura Mitokado (水戸門ホムラ, Mitokado Homura) is a former member of the dissolved Team Tobirama. He and his team-mate Koharu Utatane now serve as members of the Konoha Council.
novel: Sakura Hiden: Thoughts of Love, Riding Upon a Spring Breeze
